segments.text: Speed Airlines Reservation . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Do you have any flight to Paris on 15th ? I want one leaving in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Flight DP336 leaves at 15:16 . Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , Sir.It has an hour layover in London .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't think I want it .
segments.speaker: S2
